news_header: JD.COM INC (ADR) scores highest in Validea's Price/Sales Investor model, indicating strong fundamentals and valuation.
news_text: JD.COM INC (ADR) (JD) is a large-cap value stock in the Retail (Specialty) industry, rated highest by Validea's Price/Sales Investor model based on Kenneth Fisher's strategy. It scores 80%, indicating significant interest due to low P/S ratios, long-term profit growth, strong free cash flow, and consistent profit margins. The analysis highlights the stock's strengths and weaknesses in relation to the strategy's criteria.
